title: AspNetCoreUnsupportedMediaType
description: AspNetCoreUnsupportedMediaType is an ASP.NET Core solution which requires all http requests to have the 'Content-Type' header set to 'application/json'.

packOptions.summary: AspNetCoreUnsupportedMediaType is an ASP.NET Core solution which requires all http requests to have the 'Content-Type' header set to 'application/json'.
